0.text: Innate - Heavy Hands: Sett's basic attacks alternate between a Left Punch and a Right Punch on-attack. Sett begins attacking with a Left Punch, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a Right Punch.

1.text: Sett's Right Punch gains  50 bonus range, attacks at 8 times the Left Punch's attack speed, and deals 5 − 90 (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.

2.text: Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast: Sett  regenerates 0.25 / 0.5 / 1 / 2 (based on level) health per second for every 5% of his  missing health.

scalingPartType: % per 100 ad of target's maximum health

0.text: Active: Sett empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to deal bonus physical damage.

1.text: For 1.5 seconds, Sett also gains  30% bonus movement speed when he moves towards  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.

2.text: Knuckle Down  resets Sett's basic attack timer. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a Left Punch followed by a Right Punch, resetting Sett's current  Pit Grit state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up Right Punch.

origin: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 25% (+ 10% per 100 bonus ad) of expended grit)

scalingPartType: % per 100 bonus ad of expended grit
math.undefindRest: per 0 bonus ad of expended grit

0.text: Passive: Sett stores 100% of post-mitigation damage taken as Grit on his resource bar, up to 50% of his  maximum health. Each instance of stored Grit decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.

1.text: Active: Sett immediately gains a  shield equal to his expended Grit for 3 seconds, decaying after 0.75 seconds, and charges up a strike over the cast time.

2.text: After the cast time, he unleashes a blast in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within the area, and  true damage instead to all those in the center.

origin: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 25% (+ 10% per 100 bonus ad) of expended grit)

scalingPartType: % per 100 bonus ad of expended grit
math.undefindRest: per 0 bonus ad of expended grit

0.text: Active: Sett  pulls in enemies at his front and back in the target direction, dealing them physical damage and  slowing them by 50% for 0.5 seconds.

1.text: If Facebreaker affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are  stunned for 1 second upon landing.

origin: »200 / 300 / 400 (+ 100% bonus ad) (+ 40 / 50 / 60% of primary target's bonus health)
50 / 75 / 100 (+ 25% bonus ad) (+ 10 / 12.5 / 15% of primary target's bonus health)

0.text: Active: Sett  dashes with  displacement immunity a fixed distance over 1.5 seconds toward and past the target enemy  champion,  attaching the target to him upon arrival and  suppressing them for the duration, during which they are also  revealed. Upon completing the dash, Sett slams the target into the ground, creating a massive shockwave at the impact area.

1.text: Enemies within the epicenter take  physical damage. Enemies outside of the epicenter but within the impact area take physical damage, reduced by up to 75% at the edge. All enemies hit are  slowed by 99% for 1 second.

origin: »200 / 300 / 400 (+ 100% bonus ad) (+ 40 / 50 / 60% of primary target's bonus health)
50 / 75 / 100 (+ 25% bonus ad) (+ 10 / 12.5 / 15% of primary target's bonus health)

2.text: The dash will prematurely end upon reaching a wall that cannot be dashed through by Sett.
